ygData.subject: Starcraft and Neo Beast Wars/Machines
ygData.msgSnippet: Listen everyone, I have been noting that character names are coming from the totally wicked PC/N64 game, Starcraft.  Here are the names that I found: Neo Beast

Listen everyone, I have been noting that character names are coming from th=
e totally wicked PC/N64 game, Starcraft.  Here are the names that I found:
=

Neo Beast Wars RPG:
            -Zergling (Of the Zerg race, fast, cheap a=
nd effective in groups)

Neo Beast Machines RPG:
            -Raszagal (Lea=
der of the Protoss Dark Templar who were banished from the Protoss homeworl=
d, Aiur)
            -Archon (Of the Protoss race, two High Templars may me=
rge into a psionic entity known as an Archon.  Archons are really strong, a=
nd their movement isn't so bad)

These 3 characters are all named after uni=
ts in Starcraft(Raszagal is not a playable unit).  I guess Starcraft is mor=
e popular than I thought.  Anyway, I'm not saying that these names are chea=
p, I'm just pointing out that they are from Starcraft/Starcraft: Brood War/=
Starcraft 64.  

NOTE: The descriptions I put for these 3 guys are just fro=
m Starcraft, you don't have to use them for NBWRPG or NBMRPG.
